org.gbif.portal.selenium

Class SeleniumTestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.portal.selenium.SeleniumTestBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatasetSeleniumIT, SpeciesDetailSeleniumIT, SpeciesSearchSeleniumIT

    public abstract class SeleniumTestBase
extends Object
    Base class for Selenium test providing Before and After methods that set up a HtmlUnitDriver and tears it down again.
